gaia::graphics::PathEffect Class Reference

PathEffect is the base class for objects in the Paint that affect the geometry of a drawing primitive before it is transformed by the canvas's matrix and drawn. More...

Detailed Description

PathEffect is the base class for objects in the Paint that affect the geometry of a drawing primitive before it is transformed by the canvas's matrix and drawn. 

 //Example: draw a round corner rectangle with PathEffect on canvas
 //create path, paint
 Path path;
 Paint paint;
 paint.setColor(Color::BLACK);
 paint.setStyle(Paint::STYLE_STROKE);
 path.addRect(0.0, 0.0, 100.0, 100.0, Path::DIRECTION_CW);
 //create a base object - PathEffect
 PathEffect pe;

 //create a polymorphism object - CornerPathEffect
 pe = new CornerPathEffect(20.0);
 paint.setPathEffect(pe);
 //draw on canvas
 canvas->drawPath(path, paint);
